title: Supertech Sports Village: Play larger than life (Arjun shrma)
text: By Arjun shrma Oct 5, 2015 Supertech Sports Village, the 150 acre large, green and spacious project at the beautiful location of Noida Extension with 85 % open green landscape and wide well connected roads will surely make you feel like a dream come true providing luxurious flats, secure campus, all amenities and facilities included into one. Supertech limited, the 25 year old real estate firm in the market bring this project at the prominent location based on the theme of big widely developed projects with all facilities in the nearby vicinity and other amenities inclusive. Project provide you luxurious 2/3 bhk flats in the floor plan of 897 sq. ft. to 1253 sq. ft. Supertech Sports Village price list is decided seeing all the household necessity and making the houses affordable to all. The Basic Sale Price of the apartments start from Rs 2600 per sq. ft. and varies according to the different payment plans. The other charged include PLC's, Electricity connection, Power backup, Covered car parking, Club membership, IFMS, Lease rent and EDC/IDC. Supertech Sports Village Site Plan is well planned with vastu friendly and 3 side open plot. The apartments are well planned and constructed by taking care of the ventilation and proper light for each flat which bring healthy living to teach individual. We care of your health and well being so the apartments are constructed seeing all the needs of the residents by giving the open wide balconies for proper ventilation which bring good vibration and vastu friendly which bring positivity to your house and ultimately to your life.Supertech Sports Village Location Map is decided seeing the comfort of the fellow residents and convenience provided. So the Sport Village is located in the prominent location of Noida Extension with direct connectivity to the metro station and near to the upcoming metro corridor. The project is located near to the industrial and commercial area of Noida, Greater Noida and Ghaziabad with nearness to the Delhi.
